maps/jungle/caves/infested-cave-01.json/.orig: Oh, the cave is instanced. Looks like we're on our own.
maps/jungle/caves/infested-cave-01.json/.text: Oh, la grotte est instanciée. On dirait que c'est chacun pour soi.

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: There is no way to break that icy wall alone. \c[3]Report back to Mrs. Basu in \v[area.jungle-city.name]!\c[0]
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Il n'y a aucun moyen de briser ce mur de glace tout seul. \c[3]Revenez voir Mme Basu au \v[area.jungle-city.name] !\c[0]

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig:
Use the \c[3]Hyperforce Plasmaoven\c[0]  to melt the icy walls.
\c[3]Teleport it with charged Wave projectiles\c[0] and \c[3]trigger heat-explosions with repeated Shock attacks\c[0].
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text:
Utilisez le \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/heater]\c[0] pour faire fondre le mur de glace.
\c[3]Téléportez-le avec des projectiles d'ondes chargées\c[0] et \c[3]déclenchez des explosions avec des attaques choc répétées\c[0].

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Forni
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Forni

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Salut !

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: S-s-seeker!\. H-hello.\. I-it is good to see y-you f-finally arrive.
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: P-P-pisteur !\. B-bonjour.\. C-C'est bien que v-vous soyez f-finalement venue.
Salut... ?

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: O-oh, I-I am s-sorry.\. W-waiting in this c-c-cold m-might have g-gotten to m-me.\. P-please exc-cuse me for a s-second.
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: O-oh, J-Je suis d-désolée.\. A-Attendre dans ce f-froid a peut-être f-fini par m'avoir.\. E-Excusez-moi u-une seconde.

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Forni
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Forni

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Alright, much better.\. I am sorry, these temperatures may have frozen my professionalism along with my tongue.
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Ah, c'est mieux.\. Je suis désolée, ces températures ont gelé mon professionnalisme autant que ma langue.

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: In any case, \v[lore.title.seeker], we have work to do!\. Feast your eyes on this technological marvel!
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: En tout cas, \v[lore.title.seeker], le travail nous attend !\. Admirez-moi un peu cette merveille technologique !

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Forni
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Forni

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Our engineers called it the \c[3]Hyperforce Plasma Oven\c[0].\. A ridiculous name, to be sure, but its heating capacities are truly unmatched.
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Nos ingénieurs l'ont appelé le \c[3]Plasmafour Hyperforce\c[0].\. Ce nom est stupide, c'est sûr, mais sa capacité de chauffage est inégalée !

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: It's finely attuned to Trackwalker, meaning that you, \v[lore.title.seeker], will be able to control it with your abilities.
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Il est adapté au Retracage, pour que vous puissiez le contrôler avec vos capacités de \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: It is too heavy to move, but a \c[3]charged Wave projectile\c[0] will start a teleportation sequence that \c[3]relocates it to your position\c[0].
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Il est trop lourd pour être déplacé, mais un \c[3]projectile d'onde Chargée\c[0] va démarrer une séquence de téléportation qui \c[3]le placera sur votre position\c[0].

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Hitting it with \c[3]repeated Shock attacks\c[0] will trigger a powerful \c[3]heat-explosion\c[0] that will melt even the thickest ice!
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Le toucher avec des \c[3]attaques choc répétées\c[0] va déclencher une puissante \c[3]explosion chaude\c[0] qui peut faire fondre les glaces les plus épaisses.

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Though the machine will enter a \c[3]short cooldown phase\c[0] afterwards.
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Bien que la machine aura besoin d'une \c[3]courte phase de refroidissement\c[0] après cela.

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Forni
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Forni

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Now use this wonderful machine to melt through the ice and solve your assignment.
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Maintenant, utilisez cette merveilleuse machine pour briser la glace et remplir votre tâche.

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Darrel
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Darrel

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: I will be waiting here.\..\..\. In the cold.\.\. So please make haste, yes.
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Je vais attendre ici...\.\.\. Dans le froid.\.\. Donc dépêchez-vous, s'il vous plait.

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig:
Use the \c[3]Hyperforce Plasma Oven\c[0]  to melt the icy walls.
\c[3]Teleport it with charged Wave projectiles\c[0] and \c[3]trigger heat-explosions with repeated Shock attacks\c[0].
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text:
Utilisez le \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/heater]\c[0] pour faire fondre le mur de glace.
\c[3]Téléportez-le avec des projectiles d'ondes chargées\c[0] et \c[3]déclenchez des explosions avec des attaques choc répétées\c[0].

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Forni
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Forni

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Forni
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Forni

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: You will be able to control the \c[3]Hyperforce Plasmaoven\c[0] with your \v[lore.title.seeker] abilities.
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Vous pouvez contrôler le \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/heater]\c[0] avec vos capacités de \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Use \c[3]charged Wave projectiles\c[0] to \c[3]teleport it to your position\c[0] and \c[3]repeated Shock attacks\c[0] will trigger a \c[3]heat-explosion\c[0].
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Utilisez un \c[3]projectile d'onde chargé\c[0] pour \c[3]le téléporter sur votre position\c[0] et déclenchez des \c[3]explosions chaudes avec des attaques choc répétées\c[0]

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: But remember that the machine will enter a \c[3]short cooldown phase\c[0] after the explosion.
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Mais souvenez-vous que la machine aura besoin d'une \c[3]courte phase de refroidissement\c[0] après l'explosion.

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Now use it to melt that icewall.\. Teleport the oven next to it and then trigger an overcharged explosion!
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Maintenant utilisez le pour faire fondre le mur de glace.\. Téléportez le four juste à côté et déclenchez une explosion !

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Lawfer the Lawyer
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Voca l'avocat.

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Lawfer the Lawyer
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Voca l'avocat.

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: I-I'm freezing.\. This is not what I studied law for!
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: J-Je me les p-pèle.\. C-C'est pas pour ça que j'ai fait du droit !

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Guard
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Garde

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: Guard
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Garde

maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.orig: I am protecting the civilians from monsters.\. Please do your job before the cold gets them.
maps/jungle/caves/questcave-snowman-boss.text: Je protège les civils des monstres.\. Faites votre travail avant que le froid ne les tue.
